comment: Uses her first name and treats you like an adult. Work can't be late if you turn it in - it is all due before finals week. Sympathetic to problems. Only a tough grader if you do not use references.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Absolutely recommend Alison (prefers first name)! Very sweet and caring. My book arrived late, so she extended a quiz two weeks. Answers emails promptly and in-depth to make sure you understand. Easy grader and provides lots of feedback. Weekly quizzes, 3 discussions, 3 assignments, open-book midterm/final.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Caring
